original: Linton, Olof Ditlef, lektor, Halmstad, f. 25/9/98 i Sthlm av kont:chefen Alfred L. o. Maria Lind. G. 32 m. Irene Wallerius. Barn: Michael f. 33, Robert 37, Verna 43. — Stud:ex. i Sthlm 17, teol. kand. i Upps. 23, teol. lic. 28, teol. dr 32, stud:res. t. Ital. o. Tyskl. 29-31 o. 35. Docent i Nya test. exegetik v. Upps. univ. 32, tf. kyrkoh. i Estuna 39, lektor i kristen-d :kunsk. o. fil. v. Halmstads h. a. I. sed. 46.
translated: Linton, Olof Ditlef, lecturer, Halmstad, b. 25/9/1898 in Stockholm, son of the executive manager Alfred L. and Maria Lind. Married in 1932 to Irene Wallerius. Children: Michael, b. 1933, Robert, b. 1937, Verna, b. 1943. — Completed high school in Stockholm in 1917, earned a Bachelor's degree in theology in Uppsala in 1923, obtained a Master's degree in theology in 1928, achieved a Doctorate in theology in 1932, studied in Italy and Germany from 1929-1931 and 1935. Became an associate professor in New Testament Exegesis at Uppsala University in 1932, served as an acting vicar in Estuna in 1939, and became a lecturer in Christian religious knowledge and philosophy at Halmstad High School beginning in 1946.
